0010011101100011 1101111010110101 1 -> sum: 0000011000011001, cout: 1

1111010110001000 0001001111110101 0 -> sum: 0000100101111101, cout: 1
1101000100000001 0111000001000001 1 -> sum: 0100000101000011, cout: 1
1010000100011111 1111111011101111 0 -> sum: 1010000000001110, cout: 1
